name: times-table-js
description: Interactive diagram of times tables as seen in [this video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qhbuKbxJsk8) from Mathologer.   Written in Typescript, rendering with Three.js.   [Live Demo](http://htmlpreview.github.io/?https://github.com/MathiasLengler/TimesTableJS/blob/master/release/main.html) (requires browser that supports WebGL)
author: Mathias Lengler
